resources.string:
Dota 2 is a multiplayer online battle arena (MOBA) game
which has two teams of five players compete to collectively
destroy a large structure defended by the opposing team
known as the "Ancient", whilst defending their own.
“Once you start to learn its secrets, there’s a wild and\nexciting variety of play here that’s unmatched, even by\nits peers.”
“Once you start to learn its secrets, there’s a wild and\nexciting variety of play here that’s unmatched, even by\nits peers.”
